headline: Amex More than Doubles Land Position to Control 500 km2 in the Abitibi Region
summary: Becomes one of the largest land holders in the Abitibi region - holds 70 km along strike of Normétal-Burntbush greenstone beltMontreal, Quebec--(Newsfile Corp. - December 1, 2025) - Amex Exploration Inc. (TSXV: AMX) (FSE: MX0) (OTCQX: AMXEF) ("Amex" or "the Company") is pleased to announce that it has entered into an asset purchase agreement (the "APA") with an arm's length vendor to acquire two projects immediately adjacent to the existing Amex land package, individually named the Abbotsford...

headline: NBA Finals 2025 Post Event Analysis Report Featuring 2K Sports, Nike, PepsiCo, Emirates Airline, Michelob Ultra, State Farm, Tissot, AT&T, American Express, Google
summary: The 2025 NBA Finals present key opportunities in digital engagement, with a 215% increase in global social media views. Despite low TV ratings, strong sponsorships and sell-out attendance highlight robust market appeal. headline: How Recent Developments Are Rewriting the Story for Amex
summary: American Express has recently seen its consensus analyst price target rise slightly, inching up from $350.87 to $351.87. This adjustment follows a new round of analyst research prompted by the company’s latest earnings and outlook updates. Stay tuned to discover how investors can keep up with these shifting targets as perspectives on the stock narrative continue to evolve. Stay updated as the Fair Value for American Express shifts by adding it to your watchlist or portfolio. Alternatively,...
